lines.text: What's going on with you and Martin?
Did he say something to you?
He thinks you're getting sick of him.

[to Javo]
Would you like to stay?

[to Javo]
When you talk to me and you shut me out like that, you make me feel ugly and stupid, and boring, and I give up.
What's up? You worried about us living in the same house?
I just want it quote clear that we're not moving into this house as a couple.
We have our own rooms. That will establish us separately. Own dressing gowns, muesli, toothbrushes.
Come on babe, we can outlast the lot of 'em.
We see so little of each other we're bound to.
